name: SecGo
description:
This game was actually the winner of the WT:Software Development Studios November 2015 Game Jam with the theme: Security and Insecurity

This game uses Unreal Engine 4.10 and was worked on by a team of 4 people. This game was also completed in the time span of a week of work hours (4 days * 3.5 hours per day = 14 total hours of work)
